champ.champInfo:
Cup of the city of Lviv with kyokushinkai karate among younger boys / younger girls in In age groups born in 2015-2016, born in 2013-2014, born in 2011-2012, born in 2009-2010. and boys/girls born in 2007-2008

S. A. Mutina (5th dan, Lviv) was appointed as the chief judge of the competition. T. S. Havrylets (4th dan, Lviv) was approved as the deputy chief judge. Judging of competitions is conducted in accordance with the standards and rules of the International Kyokushinkai Karate Organization (5 judges, flag signaling).

Venue of the competition: Lviv-Vynnyky, str. Khmelnytskogo, 9B

The competition is held on October 6-8, 2023

Regulations of the competition

October 8:

  • 09.00 - 10.00 ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 10:00 - 14:00 qualifying matches in the "kumite" section
  • 14.00 - 15:00 lunch break
  • 15.00 - 19:00 start of the semi-final and final part of the competition
  • 19.00 – 20:30 end of competition, awarding of winners and prize-winners

Participants and competition rules.

Athletes younger boys / younger girls take part in the cup age groups 2009-2010, 2011-2012, 2013-2014, 2015-2016 and boys/girls Born in 2007-2008 from 0 kyu to 1 kyu.All athletes must have documents certifying their identity:
  • birth certificate
  • budo passport of the UFKK or other karate federation, valid and filled out according to the standard
  • application for participation
  • medical permission of a sports dispensary
  • insurance policy (optional)

Competitions are held separately for male and female participants. Helmets according to the standards of the current Rules will be provided by the competition organizers. Helmets must be red (AKA) or white (SIRO).

Kumite categories:

  • 2015-2016: -20.0, -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40+
  • 2013-2014: -20.0, -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, -45.0, 45+
  • 2011-2012: -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, 50+
  • 2009-2010: -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, -55.0, 55+
  • 2007-2008: -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, -55.0, -60.0, -65.0, 65+

Match time

  • 2009-2016: 1.0 min., 1.0 min., 1.0 min.
  • 2007-2008: 1.5 min., 1.5 min., 1.5 min.

FEE FOR PARTICIPATION IN THE CUP – 900 UAH.

Winners and prize-winners are awarded diplomas of the respective degrees and valuable prizes.

Competition organizing committee:
